description: Primal (Teon Macik) is a fictional comic book superhero appearing in books published by Marvel Comics. The character first appeared in Uncanny X-Men #529, in the fourth chapter of the "Five Lights" storyline, and was created by Matt Fraction and Kieron Gillen. He is one of the "Five Lights"â€”a group of mutants who manifested their abilities after the events of "Second Coming".
name: Primal
